listing.summary: Edinburgh Sports Club is a premium private members' rackets and sports club located in the West End of Edinburgh. It offers six squash courts plus a hardball doubles court, three floodlit outdoor tennis courts, three fully covered floodlit padel courts, and a dedicated table tennis facility, alongside an on-site gym, licensed bar, café and restaurant. The club is recognised as "Home of Scottish Padel" and hosts structured coaching programmes, tournaments and social events for all levels, with coaching accessible to both members and non-members.

source_info.note: Data extracted from official Edinburgh Sports Club website, specialist padel and sports directories, Scottish Squash event listings, accommodation and transport references, and mapping/geocoding sources. Coordinates are approximate and derived from mapping sources rather than official club publication.; Processed by extraction on 2025-12-09 18:41:11

other_attributes.club_type: Private members' rackets and sports club
other_attributes.location_setting: Island within the Water of Leith World Heritage area
other_attributes.events_and_calendar: Regular sports and social events listed on club calendar and What's on pages
other_attributes.equipment_shop: Rackets, balls and accessories available on-site with member discount
other_attributes.corporate_hire: Restaurant and social areas available for private hire for parties and special occasions
other_attributes.tournaments_and_leagues: Regular padel and squash events, mix-ins and tournaments including junior events
other_attributes.national_events: Hosts Scottish Squash ESC Junior Gold event
other_attributes.walking_distance_notes: Approximately 5-20 minutes from Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle depending on start point

entity.amenities_summary: Licensed bar, café-style lounge and restaurant with weekday lunches. Social spaces include lounge seating and barbecue area. Restaurant and social areas available for private hire for parties and special occasions.
entity.tennis_summary: Three floodlit outdoor tennis courts with coaching programmes for adults and juniors. Coaching available to members and non-members through the club's booking system.
entity.gym_summary: On-site gym facility available to members.
entity.padel_summary: Three fully covered, floodlit padel courts. The club is recognised as "Home of Scottish Padel" and hosts regular tournaments, mix-ins and coaching for all levels. Coaching open to members and non-members.
entity.parking_and_transport_summary: Ample on-site parking available for members and visitors, with free parking confirmed for event attendees. Located in Edinburgh's West End within walking distance of Haymarket rail/tram interchange (approximately 15-20 minutes walk) and West Maitland Street bus stops (approximately 14 minutes walk).
entity.squash_summary: Seven squash courts including six standard courts plus a hardball doubles court. Structured coaching programmes available for adults and juniors with qualified coaches, open to members and non-members via ClubSpark booking system.
entity.table_tennis_summary: Dedicated first-class table tennis facility available for members.
